text: Laurent Dufaux (born 20 May 1969 in Montreux, Switzerland) is a former Swiss professional road cyclist from 1991 to 2004. He was the Swiss National Road Race champion in 1991. == References == Category:1969 births Category:Swiss cyclists Category:Olympians for Switzerland Category:2000 Summer Olympics Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Vaud Category:Living people
title: Laurent Dufaux
